titles.title: Prefabricated Housing and Zoning Enhancement Act of 2024
To encourage local government reform of zoning and permitting to enhance housing affordability and economic growth, and for other purposes.
To encourage local government reform of zoning and permitting to enhance housing affordability and economic growth, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on Ways and Means, and Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
